version_description:
1. Bugs and performance fixes.
2. New Features
- Minutes: Users need to get minutes to initiate video calls and send gifts
- ViChat Premium: To make sure users get the best experience, we added 3 Premium options of 1 month, 6 months and 12 months to offer extra Minutes, unlimited messages and distinctive identity to users.

- We have optimized the interactive experience and interface design in this version.
- Fix some bugs.
